```{r include=FALSE}
data.path.raw = "//wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-24.04/home/rsethi/school_rsh/PKH/systems_modelling_toolkit/data/pi3k_pten/current_fit_raw.csv"
data.path.li = "//wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-24.04/home/rsethi/school_rsh/PKH/systems_modelling_toolkit/data/pi3k_pten/current_fit_li.csv"
data.path.atp = "//wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-24.04/home/rsethi/school_rsh/PKH/systems_modelling_toolkit/data/pi3k_pten/current_fit_atp.csv"
```

```{r}
df.raw = read.csv(data.path.raw)
df.li = read.csv(data.path.li)
df.atp = read.csv(data.path.atp)
colnames(df.raw)[1] = "TIME"
colnames(df.li)[1] = "TIME"
colnames(df.atp)[1] = "TIME"
```

```{r}
head(df.raw)
```

```{r}
df = data.frame(TIME=df.raw$TIME, LPS=df.raw$pAKT, ATP=df.atp$pAKT, LI=df.li$pAKT)
df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(-TIME), names_to="STIMULI", values_to="VALUES") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=TIME, y=VALUES, color=STIMULI)) +
  geom_line()
```


```{r}
df.raw %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(-TIME), names_to="SUBSTRATE", values_to="CONCENTRATIONS") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=TIME, y=CONCENTRATIONS, color=SUBSTRATE)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
df.atp %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(-TIME, -AKT, -PTEN, -LPS, -HDACi, -LiCl, -LY294002, -bpV, -GSK3B, -PI3K), names_to="SUBSTRATE", values_to="CONCENTRATIONS") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=TIME, y=CONCENTRATIONS, color=SUBSTRATE)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
df.li %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(-TIME), names_to="SUBSTRATE", values_to="CONCENTRATIONS") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=TIME, y=CONCENTRATIONS, color=SUBSTRATE)) +
  geom_line()
```
